TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: Hey, is it too late to jump on the hype trai - oh...

See guys? This is why I always try to take everything chilled out. Just do not get excited or upset, be patient and calmly ......

F5; F5; F5; F5; F5; F5; F5; F5; F5........

S3 KS-25x4 loaded.

Hypetrain, go.

New build.

They compile that stuff so fastly omg.

Edited July 16, 2014 by tetryds
Squad is sitting in their office saying, "the hype train is still operational... ITS A TRAP!"
Is there an update coming out?

And now we will see the Hype-Train go SSTO!

I'd rather not go Single Stage TO Ocean...

yes old refrence is old. For those that weren't here before the first Kerbal Kon C7 did a testing live stream trying to build a SSTO Spaceplane, and all of 'em ended up going into the ocean leading the twitch chat to change the 'O' from orbit to ocean.
And another new one! This time for Linux - looks like they are really pushing hard for this.
I guess they want this release as much as we do.

What I see when I look at that update (through some slightly rose tinted glasses) is that the new build they pushed out an hour or so ago was the proposed fix, and if testing goes well (what, that should take about 30 seconds, right?), meaning it'll be released within the hour.

Also, Rowsdowser just confirmed that the RC will be just to the testers, not to the general public.

Is there an update coming out?

If you read Page 127 there stands they are testing the last experimental build, if this goes without bugs (knock on wood) they will release it today

If there are still a part of the bug in this new Experimental build then it'll be tomorrow i think

I guess they want this release as much as we do.

* stares at tetryds from behind the bags underneath his eyes and the collection of empty Red Bulls in front of him
I'd say Kasper probably wants it more then anyone so he can get some sleep.

I'd rather not go Single Stage TO Ocean...

yes old refrence is old. For those that weren't here before the first Kerbal Kon C7 did a testing live stream trying to build a SSTO Spaceplane, and all of 'em ended up going into the ocean leading the twitch chat to change the 'O' from orbit to ocean.

Yes that moment was awesome.

* stares at tetryds from behind the bags underneath his eyes and the collection of empty Red Bulls in front of him

Kerosene is fuel. Red Bull is fuel. Kerosene is Red Bull.
And there goes the OSX build! The speed they are pushing this thing out is incredible, hats off to everyone involved!

* stares at tetryds from behind the bags underneath his eyes and the collection of empty Red Bulls in front of him

Thank You Kasper! Really we're all (ok almost all but almost) just really excited! We appreciate the work all of you guys at Squad, the experimental tester, the modds and everyone else for their hard work! Hope you get to some nice Red Bull crash induced sleep soon.
Mac build just went up, all thats left now is Win64.
If Squad brings it out today then everybody from the dev team will get a free drink from me when somebody is someday in Austria!

Crap, I broke my F6.

Your turn, F7.

Dem macros.

I'd rather not go Single Stage TO Ocean...

yes old refrence is old. For those that weren't here before the first Kerbal Kon C7 did a testing live stream trying to build a SSTO Spaceplane, and all of 'em ended up going into the ocean leading the twitch chat to change the 'O' from orbit to ocean.

I remember that, good old times!

I'm on the hype train... I'm living off of the hype... I AM GOING TO FLY ROCKETS FUELED ON PURE HYPE!

The hype is real!!!

In the beginning there was nothing. Then bang, pure hype expanded through the universe. Hype had a gravitational pull, so large collections of hype were spread throughout the universe. THEN KSP SUCKED IT UP LIKE A BLACK HOLE!

Kerbal Space Hype

I'm sorry, but I'm a bit hyped.

EDIT: Actually, I think that's caffeine, close enough!?
Choo-Choooo! #HYPETRAIN-KSP-2014

really...

Sarcasm seems to be an unknown feature on this forum.

Thanks though....

Mac build just went up, all thats left now is Win64.

It's out on Mac, but not on Windows? I have a feeling I took this out of context...
I will commence hyping. My cat is also hyped. More things to mess up by sitting on the keyboard.
